comments.text: The decommit task decommits free committed arenas in chunks and then frees any excess unused chunks.  Currently this task runs even if there are no suitable arenas to be decommited and no excess chunks.
comments.creator: jcoppeard@mozilla.com
comments.author: jcoppeard@mozilla.com
